title: Women Floral Mini Dress Long Sleeve Stand Collar Button Up Elegant Work Swing Short Pleated Dress
description: Floral Mini Dress: Exquisite and unique prints are the highlight of the design. The shape of maple leaves is lifelike, will stand out in the crowd.
Button Up Dress: Thick fabric, not lightweight and construction are of great quality. Suitable for spring/autumn. The stitching is tight and the cut is smooth.
Elegant Work Dress: There are exquisite details such as high collars, buttons down, and ruffles. The pleats and flowing hem add lightness and liveliness.
Matching: Floral short dresses are gorgeous, truly, and elegant, showing off your great leg. Perfect with neutral wedges, low ankle strap heels, jewelry, bags, sunglasses.
Occasion: Women mock neck mini dress is perfect for work, office, home, party, date, friends gathering, wedding guest, festival, travel, beach, honeymoon, casual wear.
